title: $:/plugins/xp/html-button
name: HTML Button
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/codes":{"title":"$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/codes","text":"
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLCodes]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude mode="inline-block"/>
---- <$button tag="a"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags="$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLCodes" text={{$:/language/Buttons/HTMLCodes/New/Text}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<> /> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/Caption/New}}/> "},"$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/tags":{"title":"$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/tags","text":"Section Divisions:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags]tag[Section Divisions]!has[draft.of]sort[]]"> <$transclude mode="inline-block"/>
Text Formatting:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags]tag[Text Formatting]!has[draft.of]sort[]]"> <$transclude mode="inline-block"/>
Miscellaneous Tags:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags]tag[Miscellaneous Tags]!has[draft.of]sort[]]"> <$transclude mode="inline-block"/>
---- <$button tag="a"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags="$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags [[Miscellaneous Tags]]" text={{$:/language/Buttons/HTMLTags/New/Text}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<> /> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/Caption/New}}/> "},"$:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/html-dropdown":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/html-dropdown","text":"\define statusTid() {{$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/tags}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="code" animate="yes"> {{$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/codes}} "},"$:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/html":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/html","caption":"{{$:/language/Buttons/HTML/Caption}}","condition":"[type[]] [get[type]prefix[text/]remove[text/plain]]
